text: Lagate upasthapita karaa ha’ba amalanama, tetiya tata yi lipibad'dha ache tara babe tumi aparaadhibilakaka atankagrasta dekhiba arau sihamte ka’ba, ‘haya, durbhagya amara! E'ito kenekuraa grantha! Sarau-bara ene kono karma na'i yito iyata lipibad'dha karaa horaa na'i’. Sihamte yi amala karaiche seya sanmukhata upasthita paba; arau tomara pratipalake karao prati an'yaya nakarae
